mapper.select: SELECT DRESSIMAGE, DRESSID, DRESSNAME, DRESSPRICE FROM DRESS WHERE DRESSID BETWEEN 1 AND 24 ORDER BY DRESSID ASC
SELECT F.DRESSID, F.FAVID, D.DRESSNAME, D.DRESSPRICE, D.DRESSIMAGE FROM DRESS D JOIN FAVORITES F ON D.DRESSID = F.DRESSID JOIN MEMBERLIST M ON F.MEMID = M.MEMID WHERE M.MEMID=#{memid}
